EmailTemplate.subject: TAE Aerospace Expands Honeywell TPE 331 Engine Capabilities
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Dear Customers,
In February 2019, TAE Aerospace finalized the acquisition of Copperstate Turbine Engine Company (CTEC), expanding TAE Aerospace’s Honeywell TPE 331 engine capabilities. TAE Aerospace can now offer TPE 331 customers full overhaul shop capabilities for the popular engines through the -15 AW, and is approved to repair engine part pieces and assemblies, fuel controls and LRU components.
The acquisition also positions TAE Aerospace them as the largest Honeywell Authorized TPE 331 engine support provider, providing customers with flexible and timely support on a global scale.
To learn more about TAE Aerospace’s acquisition of CTEC and to keep your TPE331 in top shape, contact TAE Aerospace today.
LEARN MORE <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/news-listing/2019/april/copperstate-turbine-engine-company-acquired-by-tae-aerospace?utm_source=email&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=19_ch_amer_bga_ctec_tpe331&utm_content=marketo&utm_term=tpe331]]>
